note: This data is expressed in 2011 [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation). Following an update, World Bank PIP now uses 2021 international-$ for its poverty and inequality data [available here](https://ourworldindata.org/grapher/poverty-share-on-less-than-30-per-day).
title: Poverty: Share of population living on less than $30 a day (2011 prices)
subtitle: This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.
